page.title: 10Farming Around Ollerton
page.content:
There are five farms within the survey area, these being
1. Jordan Castle Farm 2. West View Farm 3. Carr Brecks Farm 4. Park Farm 5. Scotts Farm
{ Winter cereal crops}such as barley dominate the current farming scene. Break crops (i.e. to break-up the regular cycle of cereal crops) are sugar beet and potatoes on the sandy soil, whilst oilseed rape and grass are used on the clay soil in the south-east of the area. { Irrigation}use is heavy on all sand-land crops, which helps to attain yields well above the national average.
